Translations.Text: apane sarvochch prabhu ke naam kee pavitrata ka smaran karo
jisane paida kiya aur theek-theek banaaya
aur jisane anumaan lagaakar nirdhaarit kiya, phir seedhee raah dikhaayee
aur jisane chaara upajaaya
phir use (sukha kar) kooda bana diya
(he nabee!) ham tumhen aisa padhaayenge ki bhoologe nahin
parantu, jise allaah chaahe. nishchay hee vah sabhee khulee tatha chhipee baaton ko jaanata hai
aur ham tumhen saral maarg ka saahas denge
to aap dharm kee shiksha dete rahen. agar shiksha laabhadaayak ho
darane vaala hee shiksha grahan karega
aur durbhaagy usase door rahega
jo bheeshan agni mein jaayega
phir usamen na marega, na jeevit rahega
vah saphal ho gaya, jisane apana shudhdikaran kiya
tatha apane paalanahaar ke naam ka smaran kiya aur namaaz padhee
balki tum log to saansaarik jeevan ko praathamikata dete ho
jabaki aakhirat ka jeevan hee uttm aur sthaayee hai
yahee baat, pratham granthon mein hai
(arthaat) ibraaheem tatha moosa ke granthon mein
kya tere paas pooree srshtee par chha jaane vaalee (kyaamat) ka samaachaar aaya
us din kitane moonh sahame honge
parishram karate thake ja rahe honge
par ve dahakatee aag mein jaayenge
unhen kholate sote ka jal pilaaya jaayega
unake lie kateelee jhaad ke siva, koee bhojan saamagree nahin hogee
jo na mota karegee aur na bhookh door karegee
kitane mukh us din nirmal honge
apane prayaas se prasann honge
oonche svarg mein honge
usamen koee bakavaas nahin sunenge
usamen bahata jal srot hoga
aur usamen oonche-oonche sinhaasan honge
usamen bahut saare pyaale rakhe honge
panktiyon mein galeeche lage honge
aur makhmalee qaaleenen bichhee hongee
kya vah oonton ko nahin dekhate ki kaise paida kiye gaye hain
aur aakaash ko ki kis prakaar ooncha kiya gaya
aur parvaton ko ki kaise gaade gaye
tatha dharatee ko ki kaise pasaaree gayee
atah aap shiksha (naseehî€¼ta) den ki aap shiksha dene vaale hain
aap unapar adhikaaree nahin hain
parantu, jo munh pherega aur nahin maanega
to allaah use bhaaree yaatana dega
unhen hamaaree or hee vaapas aana hai
phir hamen hee unaka haî€¼isaab lena hai
shapath hai bhor kee
tatha das raatriyon kee
aur jode tatha akele kee
aur raatri kee jab jaane lage
kya usamen kisee matimaan (samajhadaar) ke lie koee shapath hai
kya tumane nahin dekha ki tumhaare paalanahaar ne "aad" ke saat kya kiya
stambhon vaale "iram" ke saath
jinake samaan deshon mein log nahin paida kiye gaye
tatha "samood" ke saath jinhonne ghaatiyon me chattaanon ko kaat rakha tha
aur mekhon vaale firaun ke saath
jinhonne nagaron mein upadrav kar rakha tha
aur nagaron mein bada upadrav phaila rakha tha
phir tere paalanahaar ne unapar dand ka koda barasa diya
vaastav mein, tera paalanahaar ghaat mein hai
parantu, jab insaan kee usaka paalanahaar pareeksha leta hai aur use sammaan aur dhan deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paalanahaar ne mera sammaan kiya
parantu, jab usakee pareeksha lene ke lie usakee jeevika sankeern (kam) kar deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paalanahaar ne mera apamaan kiya
aisa nahin, balki tum anaath ka aadar nahin karate
tatha gareeb ko khaana khilaane ke lie ek-doosare ko nahin ubhaarate
aur meeraas (mrtak sampatti) ke dhan ko samet-samet kar kha jaate ho
aur dhan se bada moh rakhate ho
saavadhaan! jab dharatee khand-khand kar dee jaayegee
aur tera paalanahaar svayan padaarvan karega aur farishte panktiyon mein honge
aur us din narak laayee jaayegee, us din insaan saavadhaan ho jaayega, kintu saavadhaanee laabh-daayak na hogee
vah kaamana karega ke kaash! apane sada ki jeevan ke lie karm kiye hote
us din (allaah) ke dand ke samaan koee dand nahin hoga
aur na usake jaisee jakad koee jakadega
he shaant aatma
apane paalanahaar kee or chal, too usase prasann, aur vah tujh se prasann
too mere bhakton mein pravesh kar ja
aur mere svarg mein pravesh kar ja
